text: 4 19:J0.07 BSp_show.conrarm: Do you want to run the "create_note’ tool on the QuickNote' mcp server with arguments: kwargs: title='Copilot Toggle Function' date='2825-84-19' tags='neovim,copilot,function’ description='A Lua function that toggles GitHub Copilot on and off in Neovim with status messages' language='lua’ code='local copilot_enabled = true function ToggleCopilot() if copilot_enabled then vim.cnd("Copilot disable") copilot_enabled = false print(“Copilot Disabled") else vim.cnd("Copilot enable") copilot_enabled = true print("Copilot Enabled") Y main =
